title: 80: Changes to the Murder Timeline?  Source Refutes a Report
description:
In a pre trial hearing for Alex's murder trail, a potential piece of the State's evidence changes what we thought we knew about the timeline the night of the murders. Will it cook Alex?
The two sides discussed, phone records, gunshot residue and what pieces of evidence found at the crime scene were or were not tested.
"Cousin Eddie's polygraph is a topic of conversation and Eddie's attorney speaks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
